titles.title: Here, O my Lord, I see Thee face to face

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: Mine is the sin but yours the righteousness; mine is the guilt but yours the cleansing blood. Here is my robe, my refuge, and my peace: your blood, your righteousness, O Lord, my God.

verse.name: v4
v5
v6
v7
verse.lines: Feast after feast thus comes and passes by, Yet passing, points to the glad feast above, Giving sweet foretastes of the festal joy, The Lamb’s great bridal-feast of bliss and love.
